titleStmt.title: The daily practice of devotion, or, The hours of prayer fitted to the main uses of a Christian life also lamentations and prayers for the peaceful re-settlement of this church and state / by the late pious and reverend H.H., D.D.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Hammond. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
